title: Fix transparent backgrounds on task cards and task modals

requirements.text: Make every TaskCard render with a solid, non-transparent background in both light and dark themes so content behind the card does not bleed through.

quotes: fix: background of task card / modal is transparent which not good as I see behind and its confusing.

acceptanceCriteria: In light theme, each task card has an opaque background (no page content visible through the card).
In dark theme, each task card has an opaque background (no page content visible through the card).
Hover/focus styles still work and do not reintroduce transparency.

requirements.text: Ensure all task-related modal dialogs use a solid, non-transparent background everywhere they appear, including: Create Task dialog, Edit Task dialog, and the Delete Task confirmation dialog.

quotes: fix: background of task card / modal is transparent which not good as I see behind and its confusing.

acceptanceCriteria: Create Task dialog content is opaque (no underlying UI visible through the modal surface).
Edit Task dialog content is opaque (no underlying UI visible through the modal surface).
Delete Task confirmation dialog content is opaque (no underlying UI visible through the modal surface).
The fix applies consistently anywhere these dialogs are opened in the app.
Modal readability is maintained in both light and dark themes (text remains legible against the new solid background).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (these are read-only/immutable).
nonGoals: Redesigning the overall UI theme beyond fixing the transparency issue.
Changing modal overlay behavior (e.g., blur effects, dimming intensity) unless required to eliminate transparency of the modal surface itself.
